ygData.subject: Re: [EQ_Tinkering] Mid-level items for plats
ygData.msgSnippet: I sell spyglasses for 80p, and I sell quite a lot, have one buyer who bought over 20 of em herself for her guild. They not that hard to sell once ppl see em,
ygData.messageBody:
I sell spyglasses for 80p, and I sell quite a lot, have one buyer who bought
over 20 of em herself for her guild. They not that hard to sell once ppl see
em, use em everywhere, and auction em, once ppl know you are a tinkerer, ppl
will be starting to ask you for various items. At least that is how I do my
business :)

-Sandortien, 50th wiz of Xegony
